install.readme:
This adds the german language pack for SMF shoutbox to your SMF forum.
Originally written By Deep (diem4@gmx.net), inspired by Matthew Wolf (a.k.a Grudge) Heavily improved by Markus Birth (mbirth@webwriters.de) Copyright 2006 - Neither this package or any of it's contents may be distributed without authorization.

uninstall.readme: Uninstall will remove all the changes made by the SMF shoutbox german language pack. You must do this before upgrading!
